{"id":1034782661,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1693290944,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1034782661/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Pair Sum in an Array","memory":"67.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maxSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int res = -1;\n        for (auto i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++) {\n            int d1 = findMaxDigit(nums[i]);\n            for (auto j = i + 1; j < nums.size(); j++) {\n                if (d1 == findMaxDigit(nums[j]))\n                    res = max(res, nums[i] + nums[j]);\n            }\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n\n    int findMaxDigit(int num) {\n        int digit = 0;\n        while (num > 0) {\n            digit = max(digit, num % 10);\n            num /= 10;\n        }\n        return digit;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-pair-sum-in-an-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
